content:
The next IG publisher (the one due out today) will support publishing IGs based on R4B. You specify the version 4.1.0. This works with Sushi

The IG publisher after that (date unknown) will support publishing IGs based on R4 (current build). You specify the version 4.6.0. I don't think that this will work with Sushi, or that editors should expect that it will - there's some dirty hacks to get that to work.
And there's no prospect that 4.6.0 support will include IGs that have ConceptMaps in them.
Thanks Grahame the number of errors in the 4b guide strongly decreased :-)

I've however still some that I suppose depends on the 4.1.0 version.. for example a bunch related to the for the ig parameters
The value provided ('copyrightyear') is not in the value set http://hl7.org/fhir/ValueSet/guide-parameter-code|4.1.0 (http://hl7.org/fhir/ValueSet/guide-parameter-code), and a code is required from this value set) (error message = Unknown Code http://hl7.org/fhir/guide-parameter-code#copyrightyear in http://hl7.org/fhir/guide-parameter-code)

In all the profiles I have also this error

The Extension 'http://hl7.org/fhir/StructureDefinition/structuredefinition-fhir-type' definition allows for the types [url] but found type uri
I don't have a path for fixing the first two errors, but FMG will approve publishing anyway
the other is an error in the base FHIR spec. FMG will approve an exemption.

Hi @Grahame Grieve I still have a list of errors in the FHIR for FAIR guide that I'm not able to address (some mentioned above)
Summarizing:

For all the resources

Extension_EXT_Type
The Extension 'http://hl7.org/fhir/StructureDefinition/structuredefinition-fhir-type' definition allows for the types [url] but found type uri all resources

Terminology_TX_ValueSet_NotFound2
fsh-generated\resources\StructureDefinition-Citation-uv-f4f.json    ValueSet http://hl7.org/fhir/ValueSet/resource-security-category not found by validator

Type_Specific_Checks_DT_URL_Resolve
fsh-generated\resources\StructureDefinition-Attachment-uv-f4f.json  URL value 'http://hl7.org/fhir/build/StructureDefinition/definition' does not resolve

Only for the StructureDefinition-uv-f4f-relatedArtifact.json extension

TYPE_SPECIFIC_CHECKS_DT_CANONICAL_RESOLVE
fsh-generated\resources\StructureDefinition-uv-f4f-relatedArtifact.json Canonical URL 'http://hl7.org/fhir/ValueSet/citation-artifact-classifier' does not resolve

Only for the ImplementationGuide-hl7.fhir.uv.fhir-for-fair.json

Terminology_TX_NoValid_16
a list of existing codes/parameters used by the IG are not recognized. This is an example...

fsh-generated\resources\ImplementationGuide-hl7.fhir.uv.fhir-for-fair.json The value provided ('copyrightyear') is not in the value set http://hl7.org/fhir/ValueSet/guide-parameter-code|4.1.0 (http://hl7.org/fhir/ValueSet/guide-parameter-code), and a code is required from this value set) (error message = Unknown Code http://hl7.org/fhir/guide-parameter-code#copyrightyear in http://hl7.org/fhir/guide-parameter-code)

Could you please confirm that they cannot be fixed by me ?
In case I could, could you give me a clue for resolving ?

Thanks
